long_description: Styled like a fighter plane and inspired by hotrod culture, the unique Electra Tiger Shark 3i Bike offers easy-going cruising thanks to a 3-speed hub, coaster brakes and stellar graphics. Flat Foot Technology(R) offers a relaxed, efficient pedaling position that also allows you to easily and comfortably put both feet down on the ground when you've stopped. Aluminum frame is resilient and is adorned with matching graphics. Shimano Nexus 3-speed internally geared rear hub with coaster brake offers silky-smooth shifting and low-maintenance stopping power. Easy-shifting twist shifter and comfortable ergonomic hand grips add cruising convenience and comfort. Have fun while staying clean and looking good with the painted-to-match chain cover and front and rear fenders; saddle and grips complement the graphics. Platform pedals are compatible with most types of footwear. Let other cyclists and pedestrians know you're there with the handlebar-mounted bell that matches the motif. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Tiger Shark 3i Bike are subject to change.
